info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 19 at 7:08PM CDT until April 19 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo TX
info.description:
FFWSJT
The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Irion County in west central Texas... Southern Sterling County in west central Texas... Northwestern Tom Green County in west central Texas...
* Until 1015 PM CDT.
* At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain entering northwest Irion county moving northeast at 25 mph. Between 1.5 and 3.25 inches of rain have fallen across southern Sterling County and northwest Irion county. Additional rainfall amounts up to 2.5 inches are possible in the warned area as the storms move northeast over already saturated grounds. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Broome.
This includes the following Low Water Crossings... crossings along County Road 411, Jackson crossing Sterling Creek and Hall crossing Dry Creek.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 10:15 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 10:15 PM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Irion, TX; Sterling, TX; Tom Green, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 10:15 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 10:15 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Irion, TX; Sterling, TX; Tom Green, TX
